title: Fun Facts About the Bafta Film Awards 2026
summary: The Bafta Film Awards 2026 is a big event in London where movies and actors are celebrated. Famous stars like Leonardo DiCaprio and Timothée Chalamet will attend. The show will be on TV in the UK and the US. Some movies to watch are One Battle After Another, Sinners, Hamnet, and Marty Supreme. Jessie Buckley might win best actress, and Timothée Chalamet could win best actor. The ceremony starts before it airs on TV, so winners might be known early. It's a fun night for film fans to see who gets awards.

background_read: The Bafta Film Awards is an annual event in the UK that honors the best in film. It's like the Oscars but for British and international movies. Actors and filmmakers come together to celebrate their work. The awards include categories for best actor, best actress, and best movie. Watching it on TV lets fans see their favorite stars and find out which films win prizes. It's a special night that brings excitement to movie lovers around the world.
Article_Structure: WHO: Famous actors like Leonardo DiCaprio and Timothée Chalamet, host Alan Cumming, and nominees such as Jessie Buckley.
WHAT: The Bafta Film Awards 2026 event where movies are awarded prizes.
WHERE: Held in London at the Royal Festival Hall, broadcast on TV in the UK and US.
WHY: To celebrate and honor the best films and actors of the year.
